pinyin: xi2 de2 xing4 wu2 zhu4 gan3

sentences.english: You will feel helpless and the transience of life and helpless?
sentences.chinese: 你还会感到生活的无助和生命的无常与无奈吗？

sentences.english: The boss has a nasty habit of baiting defenceless subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 这位老板有一个作弄孤立无助的下级的恶习。

sentences.english: And you in the battle alone?
Then a bull gored him with his horns . the lion still lay helpless before them.
sentences.chinese: 接着，一头野牛也用角来顶他，狮子无助地躺在那里。

sentences.english: Afterthe great Judge Ehud died, we were completely helpless.
sentences.chinese: 自从伟大的埃胡德逝世，我们感到很无助。

sentences.english: Bends and hooks do not contribute to compression anchorages.
sentences.chinese: 弯曲和挂钩无助于压缩锚地。

sentences.english: Material incentives alone won't help(to) increase production.
sentences.chinese: 光凭物质刺激无助于提高生产。

sentences.english: The bottom line is that corporal punishment does not make students become better-behaved.
sentences.chinese: 重点是体罚无助于改善学生行为。

sentences.english: The visitor understood well the sadness and helplessness of the family.
sentences.chinese: 而访客也颇能深切地感受到，病家忧虑无助的心情。

sentences.english: I feel helpless now, as I can't fix this disease that she has.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在我很无助，我治不好她的病。

sentences.english: This dear little naked mendicant pretends to be utterly helpless.
sentences.chinese: 这可爱的赤裸的乞儿，假装全然无助。

sentences.english: The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl.
sentences.chinese: 对孤苦无助的小女孩施发妖术。

sentences.english: It allowed you to protect your helpless offspring from sabre-toothed tigers.
sentences.chinese: 它让你保护你那些无助的后代免遭剑齿虎的伤害。

sentences.english: I was in trouble for not doing my homework.
sentences.chinese: 喧吵的房间无助于我做功课。

sentences.english: The thing about fear is it can be immobilizing and incredibly unhelpful when you need to be at your most confident.
sentences.chinese: 担心会使你在最需要信心的时候感到无助和无法行动。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to be indecisive
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
